titles.title: A resolution designating September 9, 2009, as "National Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders Awareness Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 8/4/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates September 9, 2009, as National Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders Awareness Day. Calls upon the people of the United States to observe a moment of reflection on the ninth hour of September 9, 2009, to remember that during the 9 months of pregnancy a woman should not consume alcohol.
